name: Bembe
description:
Game currently in development. This is an early Alpha build of the game.

Controls

Movement: WASD

Melee Attack: J

Ranged Attack: K

Interact: E (All dialogue boxes)

Pause/Character Screen: ESC

Controller support not fully supported, but Top Down Engine's default controls may work with a controller. Controller support planned for future.

Credits:

Art/Game Design: Enesai

Environment/Game Programming  &Game Design: Saito Interactive

Character Design & Programming: Raymond00

Producer/Game Design: Stephen Roe - www.stephenroevo.com

Music/Sound Effects: musicallyroy itch.io: https://itch.io/profile/musicallyroy

Sound Effects: whotfmel

Game engine used: Unity with Top Down Engine.

All art and music were made by the team except in the current build some particle effects and sound effects remain from Top Down Engine. In the next versions of the game all art assets will be custom made by the dev team.
